TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeNodeStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style
Public NotInheritable Class TreeNodeStyle Inherits Style
public ref class TreeNodeStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style

summary.span: 表示 控制項中節點的樣式。

span.span: Represents the style of a node in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來代表在節點的樣式控制項。Use the class to represent the style of a node in the control. 控制項可讓您指定不同的樣式特性 （例如 字型和色彩） 的每個不同的節點類型。The control allows you to specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for each of the different node types. 下表列出支援的節點樣式類別。The following table lists the node styles that are supported by the class. |節點的樣式屬性Node style property|描述Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| ||當滑鼠指標進入此節點的樣式設定。The style settings for a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||分葉節點的樣式設定。The style settings for the leaf nodes.| ||節點的預設樣式設定。The default style settings for a node.| ||父節點的樣式設定。The style settings for the parent nodes.| ||根節點的樣式設定。The style settings for the root node.| ||選取節點的樣式設定。The style settings for a selected node.| 當您將節點的樣式屬性控制項，它們會套用順序如下：When you set the node style properties of the control, they are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. ，或，取決於節點類型。, , or , depending on the node type. 3. 。. 4. 。. 5. 。. 類別會繼承其成員的大部分類別。The class inherits most of its members from the class. 它會擴充類別藉由控制節點，在文字周圍的空間，以及相鄰的節點之間的間距數量的屬性。It extends the class by providing properties that control the amount of space around the text in a node, as well as the space between adjacent nodes. 使用屬性以控制左側和右側的一個節點中的文字。Use the property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the text in a node. 同樣地，屬性會控制量和以上的節點中的文字下方。Similarly, the property controls the amount of space above and below the text in a node. 您可以控制節點之間的間距數量，套用至藉由設定及其相鄰節點屬性。You can control the amount of spacing between the node that the is applied to and its adjacent nodes by setting the property. 若要控制的父節點與子節點之間的間距大小，請使用屬性。To control the amount of spacing between a parent node and a child node, use the property. 如需樣式繼承的設定的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the inherited style settings, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制中的父節點的外觀控制項的樣式屬性來設定從傳回的物件屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control by setting the style properties of the object that is returned from the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 物件資訊，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified object information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別使用所指定的物件`bag`參數。Use the constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class by using the object that is specified by the `bag` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit ChildNodesPadding { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定父節點與套用 類別之子節點之間的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between a parent node and a child node to which the class is applied.

value.span: 父節點之子節點區段上方或下方的間距 (單位為像素)，

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, that is above and below the child nodes section of a parent node.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以控制和目標節點的子節點區段底下的空間上述套用類別。Use the property to control the amount of space above and below the child nodes section of the node to which the class is applied. 這個間距被插入的父節點和其第一個子節點之間，以及其最後一個子節點之間的下一個節點。This spacing is inserted between the parent node and its first child node, as well as between its last child node and the next node. > [!NOTE] > 如果不有任何其他節點的最後一個子節點，因為這會留下底部的控制項不必要的間隔，則不會呈現後的最後一個子節點的空間。The space after the last child node is not rendered if there are no additional nodes following the last child node, because this would leave an unnecessary gap at the bottom of the control. 若要控制的子節點之間的空間量，使用屬性。To control the amount of space between child nodes, use the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定空間之上和之下的父節點的子節點一節。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the space above and below the child nodes section of a parent node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFrom(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFrom (s As Style)

span.span: The to copy.

summary.span: 將指定之 物件的樣式屬性複製至目前的 物件。

span.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用複製指定的樣式屬性的方法物件存放至呼叫這個方法的物件。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified object in the object that calls this method. > [!NOTE] > 在目前的所有屬性物件中指定的對應屬性會取代物件。All properties in the current object are replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified object. 若要複製樣式屬性，而不會取代任何已設定值，請使用方法。To copy style properties without replacing any values that have already been set, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以複製指定的樣式屬性物件插入呼叫這個方法的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the style properties of the specified object into the object that calls this method. 請注意，所有的樣式屬性會被取代。Notice that every style property is replaced. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom/CS/treenodestylecopyfromcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom/VB/treenodestylecopyfromvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定節點中文字左側和右側的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of the text in the node.

value.span: 節點文字左側和右側的間距 (單位為像素)，

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, that is to the left and right of the node's text.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制要節點的文字周圍的水平空間數量套用。Use the property to control the amount of horizontal space around the text of the node to which the is applied. 文字的左邊的緣之間的文字區域中，框線和文字的右邊緣和文字框線之間插入此空格。This space is inserted between the left edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the right edge of the text and the border for the text. 若要控制的垂直間距，請使用屬性。To control the vertical spacing, use the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制節點文字周圍的水平空間。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the horizontal space around the text of a node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定節點旁顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to the node.

value.span: 節點旁顯示之自訂影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to a custom image that is displayed next to the node.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定樣式的自訂映像。Use the property to specify a custom image for style. 這個影像會顯示節點旁邊，它可以是任何的影像檔案格式 （例如.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等），只要用戶端瀏覽器支援該格式。This image is displayed next to the node, and it can be in any image-file format (such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. 如果兩個和屬性會設定為顯示的影像所指定的一個屬性。If both the and properties are set, the image that is displayed is the one that is specified by the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

span.span: The selected value is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

span.span: The that will merge with the current node's settings.

summary.span: 將指定之 物件的樣式屬性與目前 物件的樣式屬性組合。

span.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將指定的樣式屬性合併物件的樣式屬性從呼叫這個方法的物件。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the object that this method is called from. > [!NOTE] > 方法聯結中目前未設定每個屬性設定的樣式屬性物件及其對應的值，指定與物件。The method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current object with its corresponding value in the specified object. 尚未設定的屬性會更新。Only properties that have not been set are updated. 如果指定的屬性物件未設定，在目前的對應屬性物件不會變更。If a property in the specified object is not set, the corresponding property in the current object does not change. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將指定的樣式屬性合併物件與呼叫這個方法的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with those of the object that calls this method. 請注意，只有未設定屬性會被取代。Notice that only the unset properties are replaced. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/CS/treenodestylemergewithcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/VB/treenodestylemergewithvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit NodeSpacing { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定套用 物件之節點與其相鄰節點之間的垂直間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of vertical spacing between the node to which the object is applied and its adjacent nodes.

value.span: 套用 之節點與相同層級之相鄰節點之間的垂直間距 (單位為像素)，

span.span: The amount of vertical space, in pixels, between the node to which the is applied and its adjacent nodes at the same level.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制節點之間的垂直間距量，套用至相同的層級及其相鄰的節點。Use the property to control the amount of vertical spacing between a node that the is applied to and its adjacent nodes at the same level. 此空間是上限和插入目前節點的上邊緣與前一個節點下, 緣之間，以及目前節點的上邊緣之間的下一個節點的邊緣。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the current node and the lower edge of the previous node, as well as between the lower edge of the current node and upper edge of the next node. 中的第一個節點不會呈現上方空間控制，因為這會留下不必要的間隔，在控制項的頂端。The upper space is not rendered for the first node in the control, because this would leave an unnecessary gap at the top of the control. 和屬性分開套用。The and properties are applied independently. 展開節點，不會影響節點的間距。Whether or not the node is expanded does not affect the node spacing. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定在樹狀目錄中的節點和其相鄰的節點，在相同層級之間的垂直間距。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the vertical spacing between a node and its adjacent nodes at the same level in the tree. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 將 物件返回至其原始狀態。

span.span: Returns the object to its original state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來移除任何先前定義的樣式項目及重設至其原始 （也就是預設值） 狀態的物件。Use the method to remove any previously defined style elements and reset the object to its original (that is, default) state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法以傳回物件為其預設狀態。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the object to its default state. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/CS/treenodestylemergewithcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/VB/treenodestylemergewithvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定節點文字上方和下方的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space above and below the text for a node.

value.span: 節點文字上方和下方的間距 (單位為像素)，

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, above and below a node's text.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制要節點的文字周圍的垂直空間數量套用類別。Use the property to control the amount of vertical space around the text of the node to which the class is applied. 文字的上邊緣之間的文字區域中，框線和文字的下邊緣和文字框線之間插入此空格。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the lower edge of the text and the border for the text. 若要控制水平間距，請使用屬性。To control the horizontal spacing, use the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可指定節點文字周圍的垂直空間。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the vertical space around the text of a node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]
